articles.title: Using Russian Assets to Help Ukraine Is Looking Like Europe’s Least-Bad Option - The Wall Street Journal

articles.title: Sperm donor with cancer-causing gene fathered nearly 200 children across Europe, investigation finds - CBS News
articles.description: A genetic mutation that carries a 90% cancer risk has been passed on by an unwitting sperm donor to dozens of children, a Europe-wide investigation has revealed.
articles.content: London — Sperm from a donor who unknowingly carried a cancer-causing gene has been used to conceive nearly 200 babies across Europe, an investigation by 14 European public service broadcasters, inclu… [+2905 chars]

articles.title: After Trump criticism, Zelensky says he’s ready to hold elections - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Ukrainian leader has argued elections in wartime are impossible. But with U.S. and European help, he said Tuesday, a vote could be held within three months.
